reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized identifying unique room types (Living Room, Kitchen, Dining Area, Master Bedroom, Secondary Bedrooms, and two Bathrooms) and then used specific tags for differentiation. Desc_4 (Master Bedroom) was matched to Image_9 because it explicitly shows the '套房設計' (ensuite design) via the open bathroom doorway, distinguishing it from other bedroom views (Image_7, 13). Desc_7 (Master Bathroom) was matched to Image_10 due to the visible window, strongly supporting the '採光通風佳' (good light/ventilation) tag, differentiating it from the windowless/less-ventilated Image_5/14 (Guest Bathroom, Desc_8). Desc_2 (Dining/Work Area) was matched to Image_3, which features the long, multi-functional table and extensive surrounding storage. Desc_3 (Kitchen) was matched to Image_12, which provides a focused view of the complete, modern kitchen counter and abundant storage, excluding the dining table seen in Image_2. The remaining empty rooms (Image_6 and Image_8) were assigned to Desc_5 and Desc_6 based on minor staging differences, though both are highly suitable.

matching_result_list.evidence: Clear view of the living room with a sofa, good lighting, and direct access to a balcony ('有陽台', '採光佳').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(大面落地窗與側窗), 通風良好(客廳雙面開窗附陽台門), 規劃方正(客廳空間矩形好擺家具), 有陽台(推拉門外接陽台可晾衣種植), 天花高度舒適(無壓迫感樑位簡潔), 收納機能好(電視矮櫃與側櫃提供儲物), 動線順暢(客廳銜接餐廳與玄關一目了然), 已簡易裝潢(軟裝齊全可直接入住)

matching_result_list.evidence: Features an extremely long, multi-functional table ('多功能餐桌') suitable for dining/work, surrounded by built-in storage ('收納豐富') and large windows.
